EmailTemplate.subject: Phoenix VMUG: {{Lead.First Name:default=Guest}}'s OVA Download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You, Turbofriend.
We saw you in Phoenix, and it was awesome.
Thanks for chatting with us at VMware Users Group Phoenix 2014. As promised, here is your chance to download a free 30-day trial of VMTurbo <http://vmturbo.com/product/operations-management-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmugpost&utm_content=phoenix>, the world's only unified software-driven control system. VMTurbo:
- Is a hypervisor-agnostic virtual appliance that installs & deploys in 15 minutes - Requires just 4 vCPU, 16GB RAM, & 32GB disk - Controls up to 10,000 virtual machines on a single instance - Maps your environment and provides you with specific actionable sizing and placement recommendations to bring your environment into its healthiest desired state in just 1 hour - all of which can be taken manually or automatically through the VMTurbo interface Learn More <http://vmturbo.com/product/operations-management-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmugpost&utm_content=phoenix> Downloads White Papers 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
